mapper.select: SELECT a.account_id, a.password, a.nickname, a.real_name, a.email, a.bind_email, a.sex, a.id_number, a.phone, a.bind_phone, a.birthdate, a.certificate_type, a.certificate_number, a.update_time, a.registration_date, a.account_type, r.reseller_type, r.reseller_name FROM account a LEFT JOIN reseller r ON a.account_id = r.reseller_id WHERE a.email=#{email}

SELECT a.account_id, a.password, a.nickname, a.real_name, a.email, a.bind_email, a.sex, a.id_number, a.phone, a.bind_phone, a.birthdate, a.certificate_type, a.certificate_number, a.update_time, a.registration_date, a.account_type, r.reseller_type, r.reseller_name FROM account a LEFT JOIN reseller r ON a.account_id = r.reseller_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.insert: insert into account (account_id, nickname, email, password, phone, registration_date, account_type) values (#{accountId}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{registrationDate}, #{accountType})
insert into reseller (reseller_id, reseller_type, reseller_name) values (#{accountId}, #{resellerType}, #{resellerName})
